name: Berdean's Cube Steak
author: gerhart
summary: My mom's recipe. Make gravy from the remains by adding flour, milk, salt, and pepper.
directions: Season the cube steaks on both sides with salt and pepper
Pour the flour onto a shallow plate and press the steaks into the flour; shake off the excess flour
Heat the oil in a large skillet with lid over medium-high heat
Place the steaks into the hot oil, and cook until golden brown on both sides, about 3 minutes per side
Pour water into the skillet to almost cover the steaks
Stir the beef bouillon and salt to taste into the water
Bring to a boil; reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until very tender, about 2 hours
